title: New renovations 3 bed. Laundry, bus/T, Minutes to Boston
neighborhood: EVERETT, MALDEN, MEDFORD, CHELSEA, REVERE, EAST BOSTON
posting_body: ['HOT LOCATION!!!', 'GREAT EVERETT NEIGHBORHOOD!', 'NEWLY RENOVATED!', 'Be the first to live in this newly renovated unit!', 'Beautiful 3 bedroom 1 bath', 'Big, bright, sunny unit!', 'Huge eat in kitchen.', 'Secured and quiet building in a quiet residential neighborhood.', 'Laundry on site.', '$2800 monthly rent.', 'No utilities included.', 'No pets.', 'Security deposit required.', "Located close to Target, Costco, Wegman's, Encore Casino.", 'Close to Assembly Row-Trader Joes', "Station Landing-Pizzeria Regina, Kelly's Roast Beef", 'Close to Orange Line (Malden Station, Wellington, Sullivan)', 'Bus line to Boston and Malden is across the street.', 'No more waiting outside in the cold for the bus!', 'Wait right in the warm lobby!', 'Minutes in to Boston by car via RT99, Bus and Train-Orange Line', 'Unit is located on the second floor by stairs.', 'Undergrads and Grad students welcome!', 'Housing/vouchers welcome!', 'We have other 1, 2, and 3 bedroom units also available in the Everett, Malden and Chelsea areas.', 'For more info and to schedule a showing please call 617-721-7950.', 'Do not reply to this post, of you do please include your phone number.', 'No text messages please']
